pages.text: Imbued Deco adds a few blocks can can double as decorative and functional, at least a little.$(li)Imbued Hopper: Transfers an entire stack of items at a time.$(li)Tiny Cauldron: Leetle. Stores a potion in it, emitting the potion particles when full$(li)Potion Block: Potions are placeable! The colors match the potions you place.
